news.content:
We have been, for some months, in testing mode on our ThreeFold Grid 3.X and today we are sharing whatâ€™s new in TF Grid 3.0.1 â€“ and the path to mainnet! ðŸš¨


Including: improvements suggested for 3.x farming model, a web-based widget to simplify calculations, validator nodes, a DAO, and what we still need to for mainnet!


Find the full update here.


And a big thank you to the testers & farmers who have offered your time & feedback in helping us get to where we are today!
news.excerpt: Today we are sharing whatâ€™s new in TF Grid 3.0.1, now live on Testnet and Devenet â€“ and the path to Mainnet!
